scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This is an one-page autograph letter, July 9 [1881], from Matthew Arnold, Cobham, Surrey, to the Rev. R[ichard]A[cland]Armstrong thanking him for his book and commenting that "there is not a word of harshness, but on the contrary much kindness in your criticism of me."
